---
title: "BGM Mapper"
author: "Cam Ainsworth"
---

BGM mapper displays BGM file as a map.  Enter in a generic vector (biomass, catch, etc.) to display density values using colour scale.  Good for visualizing input/output data by polygon.  The vector of density values should be arranged in the same order as your polygons in the BGM mapper.  Contact: [ainsworth@usf.edu](mailto:ainsworth@usf.edu)
